title: Chef

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every three nights, you learn how many roles you cannot win with are sitting next to each other.
- The first and last player count as sitting next to each other

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Town win the game.

desc:
Post 4578
*"This evening's reservations seem odd. Never before has Mrs Mayweather kept company with that scamp from Hudson Lane. Yet, tonight, they have a table for two. Strange."*
